Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone! Just started playing KSP a week ago, and after many lawn-dart incidents just playing around with assemblies, I finally got a Communications Sat into orbit, and to stay there.

Thanks to everyone who has put time into the Wiki. Boy was that a lifesaver of my Kerbals. A lot of great information there.
Welcome to the game and welcome to the forums. Next stop for you...the Mun...Next stop after that...a rescue mission to get your Kerbals off the Mun.
